trends: There have been 36 other sightings in Tempe
There was one other sighting in Tempe on or around August 13th 2009
Summary: Second night in a row I have video footage of something in the Arizona sky!!
Object Shape: Chevron, Diamond, Egg, Fireball, Oval, Saturn-like, Star-like, Other
divs: sighting detailswent out back about 10pm to see if the unidentified object would show up 2nights in a row? my 12 yr old was with me as we recorded about 20-30 mins of what i thought was just another ordinary bright star, this object didnt put the show the object i recorded the previous night did! but, after watching the video on a larger screen the object that i have on tape is more than an ordinary bight star, it has a distinct diamond\saucer shape with the light or lights circling the center of the object and exposing a perfect silouet of the top and bottom of this object. while tonight object didnt have the wow factor that the object i taped on 8\13 it was still impressive and is something that needs to be investigated by someone with a little more knowledge of ufo etc. thewse sighting have me a little scared nervous!
